mapper.select: SELECT * FROM appinfodb.app_info tb, (SELECT id AS cId1, categoryName AS categoryName1 FROM appinfodb.app_category WHERE parentId IS NULL) tb1, (SELECT id AS cId2, categoryName AS categoryName2 FROM appinfodb.app_category WHERE parentId IS NOT NULL AND parentId IN (SELECT id FROM appinfodb.app_category WHERE parentId IS NULL)) tb2, (SELECT id AS cId3, categoryName AS categoryName3 FROM appinfodb.app_category WHERE parentId IS NOT NULL AND parentId NOT IN (SELECT id FROM appinfodb.app_category WHERE parentId IS NULL) AND parentId IN (SELECT id FROM appinfodb.app_category WHERE parentId IS NOT NULL AND parentId IN (SELECT id FROM appinfodb.app_category WHERE parentId IS NULL))) tb3, (SELECT valueId fId, valueName flatFormName FROM appinfodb.data_dictionary WHERE typeCode = 'APP_FLATFORM') tb4, (SELECT valueId sId, valueName statusName FROM appinfodb.data_dictionary WHERE typeCode = 'APP_STATUS') tb5, (SELECT info.id AS appId, version.versionNo FROM app_info info LEFT JOIN app_version version ON info.versionId = version.id) tb6, (SELECT id devId1, devCode, devName FROM appinfodb.dev_user) tb7 WHERE tb.categoryLevel1 = tb1.cId1 AND tb.categoryLevel2 = tb2.cId2 AND tb.categoryLevel3 = tb3.cId3 AND tb.flatformId = tb4.fId AND tb.`status` = tb5.sId AND tb.id = tb6.appId AND tb.devId = tb7.devId1 and tb.devId=#{devId} and tb.id=#{id};
select count(1) from app_info where APKName=#{apkName};
mapper.insert: insert into app_info(softwareName, APKName, supportROM, interfaceLanguage, softwareSize, devId, appInfo, status, flatformId, categoryLevel3, downloads, createdBy, creationDate, categoryLevel1, categoryLevel2, logoPicPath, logoLocPath) values (#{softwareName},#{apkName},#{supportRom},#{interfaceLanguage},#{softwareSize},#{devId},#{appInfo},#{status},#{flatformId},#{categoryLevel3},#{downloads},#{createdBy},now(),#{categoryLevel1},#{categoryLevel2},#{logoPicPath},#{logoLocPath});
mapper.update: update app_info set logoLocPath=null ,logoPicPath=null where id=#{id};

update app_info
modifyDate=now(),
softwareName=#{softwareName},
supportROM=#{supportRom},
interfaceLanguage=#{interfaceLanguage},
softwareSize=#{softwareSize},

flatformId=#{flatformId},
categoryLevel3=#{categoryLevel3},
downloads=#{downloads},
createdBy=#{createdBy},
categoryLevel1=#{categoryLevel1},
categoryLevel2=#{categoryLevel2},
logoPicPath=#{logoPicPath},
logoLocPath=#{logoLocPath},
modifyBy=#{modifyBy},
where id=#{id};
